groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_FullFolder
groups.text:
This folder is full.

Please select another folder.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_ChangeFolder
groups.text:
This folder is full.

Please select another folder.

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Exchange_Agreement
groups.text:
Do not send Flipnotes that are illegal,
offensive or could infringe on the rights
of others. By sending a Flipnote, you
confirm that you have obtained all
necessary rights and permissions from
third parties. You also agree that unlocked
Flipnotes may be edited, posted to the
internet or further shared with third parties.

groups.label: ExchangeUpper_TxtSetContents_Send
groups.text:
Select a Flipnote and touch Send.
Hold the L Button to select
several Flipnotes at once.

groups.label: WindowInfo_Contents_Exchange_Top
groups.text:
If you close the system or open
the HOME Menu during exchange,
you will be disconnected from the
other user, so please be careful.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_MemoExchange_Agreement
groups.text:
Please read the information
on the upper screen before
proceeding.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_StartWirelessOff
groups.text:
To perform an exchange,
you must enable wireless
communication.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_ErrorNothingPartner
groups.text:
Could not connect to
the other user.

groups.label: WindowWait_MemoExchange_Receive_MemoFileCrached
groups.text:
The transfer could not be
completed because some
Flipnote data is corrupted.
